籤詩版本二:
Tun ina yaro nake shirin yin kasuwanci, don haka ba na bukatar in nemi dukiya da dukiya.
Idan mutum biyu suna neman wani abu, malamin zai fita ya dawo da babbar kyauta.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram ya kasance alamar kasuwanci tun lokacin yaro.
Yi ƙwazo da ƙwazo a cikin komai kuma ba tare da damuwa ba.
解曰: Tun daga yarinta har zuwa girma. Babu shamaki, babu shamaki. Yi shiri. Sunan yana tafiya lafiya.
籤詩故事一:
◇Cai Qing ya mayar da alherinsa (Cai Yong)
Cai Yong, mai suna Bojie, an haife shi a Chenliuyu (yanzu kudu da gundumar Qixian, lardin Henan). Shi malami ne kuma mijin Zhao Wuniang. Shekaru biyar da suka gabata, kotun daular ta dauki hazaka a jerin sunayen masu launin rawaya, kuma gundumar ta ba shi shawarar da ya zo birnin Beijing don yin jarrabawar, tun daga lokacin ba a samu labari ba.
Shekara ta farko bayan da Cai Bojie ya tafi yana da sauƙi a magance shi, iyalin sun sami ɗan ajiyar kuɗi kuma rayuwarsu ta kasance mai sauƙi.
A shekara ta gaba, Chenliu ya fuskanci fari mai tsanani, don haka ya dogara ga Zhao Wuniangdian don sayar da kayan ado don tsira daga yunwa, babu wani labari daga Cai Bojie, wanda ya kara damun iyalin.
Farin ya dau tsawon shekaru uku a wannan lokacin. Zhang Guangcai, makwabciyar ƙauyen, yana taimaka mata lokaci zuwa lokaci.
Daga baya, Cai Bojie ya sami lambar yabo ta farko kuma ya koma gida ya ji cewa Zhang Guangcai ya taimaka wa matarsa. Ma'auratan sun je gidan Zhang don nuna godiyarsu tare da ba Zhang Guangcai kyautar azurfa guda biyu.
聖意: A gida lafiya, kai a wadata, sana’a ta ci nasara, aure ya ci nasara, an yi nasara a haifi namiji, gona ta cika da tsummoki, dabbobi shida sun wadata, bincike ya ci nasara, shari’a ta ci nasara. , hijira ta yi nasara, dukiyar da aka yi hasarar tana da kyau, rashin lafiya dutse ne kuma kabari yana da kyau.
古人: Cai Qing ya mayar da alherinsa (Cai Yong)
